sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="add(props)">添加</el-button>
  <el-table :data="tbData.slice((currentPage - 1) * pagesize, currentPage * pagesize)" style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column type="expand" style="left: 20px">
      <template #default="props">
        <!-- <template > -->
        <el-table
          :data="props.row.children"
          style="width: 100%; margin-left: 40px"
        >
          <el-table-column prop="departmentName" label="科室" width="150" />
          <el-table-column prop="createTime" label="日期" width="300" />
          <el-table-column fixed="right" label="操作" width="200">
            <template #default="row">
              <el-button type="success" @click="handleClick(row)">
                编辑
              </el-button>
              <!-- 删除确认框 -->
              <el-popconfirm title="确定要删除吗?" @confirm="del(row)">
                <template #reference>
                  <el-button type="danger">删除</el-button>
                </template>
              </el-popconfirm>
            </template>
          </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column prop="departmentName" />
  </el-table>
   <el-pagination
    currentPage="currentPage4"
    :page-sizes="[5, 10, 15, 20]"
    page-size="15"
    :background="background"
    layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
    :total="tbData.length"
    @size-change="handleSizeChange"
    @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
  />
</template>



<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      tbData: []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    get('/getAllDepartments').then((res) => {
      console.log(res)
      this.tbData = res.data
    })
  },
  methods: {}
}
</script>
